results.content: Content and presentation by Zeal was very good and information.
results.content_html: Content and presentation by Zeal was very good and information.

results.content: So many services available!!! Great instructor! I think some topics are mixed and could be better arranged for continuity, I found similar/same topics in sections where we were trying to understand something else.. Also even there are no prerequisites, it is great if you have Linux experience due to all the demos, I'm more a windows user and even I understood the concepts, it would be better to see in the environment I am familiar with. Some few topics were not as detail as expected or were described to fast (maybe were not as essential for thee Exam). Even so, it was fun to learn with Zeal (many great real life examples) and very complete and clear.
results.content_html: So many services available!!! Great instructor! results.content: Overall very good for people who don't know much about AWS. It was very basic, but the notes were sufficient for me to understand it well and pass the exam.
results.content_html: Overall very good for people who don't know much about AWS. It was very basic, but the notes were sufficient for me to understand it well and pass the exam.

results.content: Excellent course covering all topics in great detail. Tend to get lost by the time you reach the end of the course. So would help if there are few short quizzes at the end of important videos to assess the understanding till that point.
results.content_html: Excellent course covering all topics in great detail. Tend to get lost by the time you reach the end of the course. So would help if there are few short quizzes at the end of important videos to assess the understanding till that point.

results.content: Need to keep the course updated with latest services and offering from amazon. Otherwise fantastic content.
results.content_html: Need to keep the course updated with latest services and offering from amazon. Otherwise fantastic content.

results.content:
Thanks a lot for the course, I've pass the exam.
But there's a lack of topics that must be clarified more (IMHO, there're questions about):
1. The container part should be described much better, the difference between Fargate and ECS, what's ECR.
2. Difference between Site-to-Site VPN, VPN Client and Direct connect.
3. Agility vs Elasticity.
4. All Code* Services.
5. X-Ray, Glue, License Manager.
6. What's displayed on the user's credential page.
results.content_html:

3. Agility vs Elasticity.
4. All Code* Services.
5. X-Ray, Glue, License Manager.
6. What's displayed on the user's credential page.

results.content: Good lecture however I think there should be waaaaaay more updates eg. EMR, Neptune, ECS, Clustering, Glue, SWF, HSM, Kinesis, Reserved Instances, SWF, ITSM tools etc were missing and had to research these services/resources on my own all of which are repeat questions in the past exam questions. This course needs to be rendered obsolete or immensely updated in order to pass exams in 2022

response.content:
Hello Lola

All of the services which you have mentioned have already been added in the course in the latest update. When a new service is introduced in the exams, it takes us a week or two to record new videos and upload them to the course. But rest assured, everything gets updated to the course in short time.
